DOC.brief_summary: Patients undergo 4-week placebo lead-in diet period , 12-week treatment period . Clinical efficacy safety evaluate week 4 , 8 12 . This study take approximately 18 week individual patient complete include post-visit week 14 .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Ezetimibe Korean Patients With Primary Hypercholesterolemia ( 0653-042 )
DOC.criteria: Korean male female least 18 year age hypercholesterolemia
